  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.associations
    Class
    Description
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.classifiers.meta

  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.filters
    Class
    Description
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SimpleStreamFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple stream filters.
    Sourcable
    Interface for filters that can be converted to Java source.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.filters.supervised.attribute
    Class
    Description
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that make use of a class attribute.
  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.filters.supervised.instance
    Class
    Description
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that make use of a class attribute.
  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute
    Class
    Description
    Filter
    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.
    SimpleBatchFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    SimpleStreamFilter
    This filter is a superclass for simple stream filters.
    Sourcable
    Interface for filters that can be converted to Java source.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
    UnsupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that do not need a class attribute.
  • Classes in weka.filters used by weka.filters.unsupervised.instance

    An abstract class for instance filters: objects that take instances as input, carry out some transformation on the instance and then output the instance.

    This filter is a superclass for simple batch filters.
    SimpleFilter
    This filter contains common behavior of the SimpleBatchFilter and the SimpleStreamFilter.
    StreamableFilter
    Interface for filters can work with a stream of instances.
    UnsupervisedFilter
    Interface for filters that do not need a class attribute.
